00169 inline iview::IColorSchema::TickerType operator|(iview::IColorSchema::TickerType tickerType1, iview::IColorSchema::TickerType tickerType2)
00170 {
00171        return (iview::IColorSchema::TickerType)(int(tickerType1) | int(tickerType2));
00172 }
